actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to prevent contractors from replacing certain employees participating in a strike, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires that every public contract under the Walsh-Healey Act shall contain a provision that the contractor must notify the contracting agency whenever a strike occurs involving employees who are engaged in carrying out such contract. Directs the head of the agency involved to terminate any contract if he determines that the contractor has replaced, or attempted to replace, any employee participating in such a strike.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to prevent contractors from replacing certain employees participating in a strike, and for other purposes.
